refnamediv.refpurpose: Start/stop jack_transport and can optionally relocate the playback head.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Start/stop jack_transport and can optionally relocate the playback head.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: icommand -- 1 to start playing, 0 to stop.
ilocation -- optional location in seconds to specify where the playback head should be moved. If omitted, the transport is started from current location.
refsect1.note: Since jacktransport depends on jack audio connection kit, it will work only on Linux or Mac OS X systems which have the jack server running.
